alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Pope; Stearns; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 11:20PM CDT until June 20 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Douglas County in west central Minnesota... Pope County in west central Minnesota... Southern Todd County in central Minnesota... Northwestern Stearns County in central Minnesota... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1120 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Glenwood to 9 miles west of Benson, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sauk Centre, Long Prairie, Glenwood, Starbuck, Brooten, Grey Eagle, Lake Osakis, Little Sauk, Round Prairie, Grove Lake, Villard and Gilchrist. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
